title: Weve got a really high ceiling : Underwood applauds team resolve
body_text:
On this episode of the Oskee Talk podcast, we say farewell to The Law Firm and welcome another football transfer. I also revisit Illinois’ victory over FAU, Brad Underwood’s assessment of his team following the loss at Tennessee, and a disappointing Big Ten opener for women’s hoops.
‘We’ve got a really high ceiling’: Underwood applauds team’s resolve
The Fighting Illini finally return home after a challenging week of basketball.
